verbose_text: Whilst it is known that severe GD associated GBA substitutions increase the risk of cognitive decline (Alcalay et al. 2012; Winder-Rhodes et al. 2013), recent evidence indicated that the p.E326K substitution also increases the risk of working memory / executive function decline and visuospatial memory impairment in PD (Mata et al. 2015).
evidence: p.E326K substitution also increases the risk of working memory/executive function decline and visuospatial memory impairment in PD
